revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Ruckus Wireless |model=ZoneFlex 2942 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/03/2007 |manuf_country= |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=S9G2XX2-XXX |ic_id=5912A-2XX2 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR2315A |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT48LC16M16A2-7E D |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2315A |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6060 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Smart Wi-Fi 802.11g Multimedia Access Point}} aka '''ZF2942'''
There is an '''Altera''' MAX II CPLD on the board.
"ASM 120-10105-["<written 001>"]REV["<written A>"]", "Ser. No.", "Husky", and the '''Ruckus Wireless''' logo is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :"HUSKY_NOPCI_" and "INVERT 5/15/07" is on a sticker affixed to the component side of the board. :"FAB 100-10105-001 REV A" is on the other side of the board.
The following is per the FCC datasheet... *'''RF power output:''' 23dBm *'''BSSIDs:''' up to 4
The '''Ruckus Wireless''' logo, "PATENTS PENDING", "Tomahawk", "ASM 120-10100-[ ]REV", and "FAB 100-10100-001 REV" is silkscreened on the antenna module main board.
